title: American Horror Story 7x08 Promo "Winter of Our Discontent" (HD) Season 7 Episode 8 Promo
author: TV Promos
comment: Evan truly deserves an award for this season cause damn he can play any freakin character! Kai has officially become my favorite character he has played.
So ally's finally getting her shit back... I'm living for this.....

I was kinda wondering wtf was happening in the last episode with that backstory but THE LAST MOMENT MADE IT WORTH IT. Wow. They think they're rebelling against Kai but they're still doing what he wants. Wow.
Absolutely love this season I'm hooked! Better story than last season
AHS getting back to it's roots..i'm living for this season!
description:
American Horror Story 7x08 "Winter of Our Discontent" Season 7 Episode 8 Promo - Check out the promo for American Horror Story: Cult Season 7 Episode 8 "Winter of Our Discontent" airing Tuesday on FX. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more American Horror Story season 7 promos in HD!
